mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS and_qna_#{and_id}( and_qna_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , and_id INT default #{and_id}, user_id INT NOT NULL , and_qna_title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , and_qna_content VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL , published_at DATETIME DEFAULT now() , updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT now() , is_deleted BOOL default false );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS and_qna_reply_#{and_id}( and_reply_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , and_qna_id INT NOT NULL , and_id INT default #{and_id}, user_id INT NOT NULL , and_reply_content VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL , published_at DATETIME DEFAULT now() , updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT now() , is_deleted BOOL default false );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS and_role_#{and_id}( and_role_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , and_id INT default #{and_id}, and_role VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL , and_role_limit INT NOT NULL , is_deleted BOOL default false );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS and_applicant_#{and_id}( and_apply_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , and_id INT default #{and_id}, user_id INT NOT NULL , and_role_id INT NOT NULL , and_apply_title VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL , and_apply_content VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL , and_apply_file VARCHAR(2000), and_apply_status INT default 0, is_deleted BOOL default false );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS and_board_#{and_id} ( and_board_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , and_id INT default #{and_id}, user_id INT NOT NULL, and_board_tag INT, and_board_title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, and_board_content VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL, and_img VARCHAR(255), published_at DATETIME DEFAULT now(), updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT now(), and_board_view_count INT DEFAULT 0 , is_deleted BOOL default false );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS and_member_#{and_id} ( member_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , and_id INT default #{and_id}, user_id INT NOT NULL, and_apply_id INT, is_deleted BOOL default false );
